name: Angel's Revenge
description:
Angel's Revenge

Hey!

Welcome to my first game: Angel's Revenge. You are an angel who has to kill monsters and many bosses (in story mode)!

Arcade

In arcade mode, you can kill many monsters until you reach the 100 score.Will you do it?

Story Mode

Story mode will also be added in the future, which will contain various missions.

Controls

Arrow Up - Go to the top

Arrow Down - Go to the down

Space - Attack

Esc - Return to the menu
